# Database Configuration
# Set DATABASE_TYPE or DB_TYPE to one of: sqlite, postgres, mysql
DATABASE_TYPE=sqlite
# DB_TYPE=postgres

# SQLite Configuration
# Option 1: Specify full database path (recommended)
# DATABASE_URL=./data/app.db
# DATABASE_URL=sqlite://./data/app.db

# Option 2: Specify directory only (defaults to current directory if not set)
# SQLITE_DIR=./data

# Option 3: Use defaults (no configuration needed)
# If neither DATABASE_URL nor SQLITE_DIR is set, creates ./app.db in current directory

# For production with EFS (AWS)
# EFS_MOUNT_PATH=/mnt/efs

# PostgreSQL Configuration
# Option 1: Use connection string
# DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/dbname
# POSTGRES_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/dbname

# Option 2: Use individual settings
# POSTGRES_HOST=localhost
# POSTGRES_PORT=5432
# POSTGRES_USER=postgres
# POSTGRES_PASSWORD=yourpassword
# POSTGRES_DB=app

# SSL Configuration for PostgreSQL (e.g., AWS RDS)
# SSL is always enabled for PostgreSQL connections
# DB_SSL_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=false (set to 'false' for self-signed certificates)

# MySQL Configuration
# Option 1: Use connection string
# DATABASE_URL=mysql://user:password@localhost:3306/dbname
# MYSQL_URL=mysql://user:password@localhost:3306/dbname

# Option 2: Use individual settings
# MYSQL_HOST=localhost
# MYSQL_PORT=3306
# MYSQL_USER=root
# MYSQL_PASSWORD=yourpassword
# MYSQL_DATABASE=app

# Generic database settings (used by all database types)
# DB_HOST=localhost
# DB_PORT=5432
# DB_USER=dbuser
# DB_PASSWORD=dbpassword
# DB_NAME=app

# Email Configuration (Resend)
# Get your API key from https://resend.com/api-keys
# RESEND_API_KEY=re_123456789_abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz
# EMAIL_FROM=noreply@yourdomain.com

# Site Configuration
# DOMAIN is used for generating absolute URLs in production (e.g., in emails)
# LOCAL_DOMAIN is used for development environment
# DOMAIN=https://yourdomain.com
# LOCAL_DOMAIN=http://localhost:3000

# OAuth Configuration
# Google OAuth
# NEXT_PUBLIC_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=your-google-client-id
# GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=your-google-client-secret

# GitHub OAuth
# NEXT_PUBLIC_GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=your-github-client-id
# GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=your-github-client-secret

# Facebook OAuth
# NEXT_PUBLIC_FACEBOOK_CLIENT_ID=your-facebook-app-id
# FACEBOOK_CLIENT_SECRET=your-facebook-app-secret

# Apple OAuth
# NEXT_PUBLIC_APPLE_CLIENT_ID=your-apple-client-id
# APPLE_CLIENT_SECRET=your-apple-client-secret
